mapper.select: SELECT t.cinvccode AS 'cinvccode', t.cInvCName AS 'cinvcname', convert(decimal(8,0),ISNULL(a.fhNB,0)) AS 'drfh', convert(decimal(8,0),ISNULL(b.fhNB,0)) AS 'ylfh', convert(decimal(8,0),ISNULL(d.bhNB,0)) AS 'drbh', convert(decimal(8,0),ISNULL(e.wfNB,0)) AS 'wf', convert(decimal(8,0),ISNULL(c.kcNB,0)) AS 'kc' FROM InventoryClass t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.cinvccode, SUM(t.iquantity) fhNB FROM kcsaleoutlist t WHERE ddate= #{dataDate} AND t.cwhcode IN ('1001','2037') AND t.cstcode='11' GROUP BY t.cinvccode ) a ON t.cinvccode = a.cinvccode LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.cinvccode, SUM(t.iquantity) as fhNB FROM kcsaleoutlist t WHERE substring(convert(varchar(10),t.ddate,112),1,6) = #{dataMonth} AND t.cwhcode IN ('1001','2037') AND t.cstcode='11' GROUP BY t.cinvccode ) b ON t.cinvccode = b.cinvccode LEFT JOIN ( SELECT substring(cInvCode,1,4) AS cinvccode, SUM(iQuantity) AS kcNB FROM SA_BatchRef WHERE cWhcode = '1001' GROUP BY substring(cInvCode,1,4) HAVING SUM(iQuantity) > 0 ) c ON t.cinvccode = c.cinvccode LEFT JOIN ( SELECT substring(d.cInvCode,1,4) AS cinvccode, SUM(d.iQuantity) AS bhNB FROM SO_SODetails d INNER JOIN SO_SOMain m ON d.cSOCode = m.cSOCode WHERE m.dDate = #{dataDate} AND m.cSTCode = '11' AND m.cDepCode IN ('1806', '1807') GROUP BY substring(d.cInvCode,1,4) ) d ON t.cinvccode = d.cinvccode LEFT JOIN ( SELECT substring(d.cInvCode,1,4) AS cinvccode, SUM(d.iQuantity) AS wfNB FROM SO_SODetails d INNER JOIN SO_SOMain m ON d.cSOCode = m.cSOCode WHERE m.dDate = #{dataDate} AND m.cSTCode = '11' AND m.cDepCode IN ('1806', '1807') AND ISNULL(m.iStatus,'0') <> '1' GROUP BY substring(d.cInvCode,1,4) ) e ON t.cinvccode = e.cinvccode WHERE substring(t.cinvccode,1,2) = '21' AND t.iInvCGrade = '2' order by t.cinvccode
SELECT '1001' AS 'code', '库存现金' AS 'name', isnull(g.me,0) AS 'amount' FROM GL_accsum g WHERE g.iYPeriod = #{dataMonth} AND g.ccode = '1001'

SELECT isnull(sum(case when substring(g.ccode,1,4) in ('1001','1002') then g.md end),0) as 'srAmount', isnull(sum(case when substring(g.ccode,1,4) in ('1001','1002') then g.mc end),0) as 'zfAmount', isnull(sum(case when substring(g.ccode,1,4) in ('1002') then g.me end),0) as 'yeAmount' FROM GL_accsum g INNER JOIN ( select distinct ccode,ccode_name from vwVoucherData ) a on g.ccode=a.ccode WHERE g.iYPeriod = #{dataMonth} AND substring(g.ccode,1,4) in ('1001','1002')

SELECT g.ccode AS 'code', a.ccode_name AS 'name', isnull(g.md,0) AS 'rkAmount', isnull(g.mc,0) as 'zfAmount', isnull(g.me,0) as 'yeAmount' FROM GL_accsum g INNER JOIN ( select distinct ccode,ccode_name from vwVoucherData ) a on g.ccode=a.ccode WHERE g.iYPeriod = #{dataMonth} AND substring(g.ccode,1,4) in ('1001','1002') order by g.ccode
